channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: “In many ways Rivian is a modern day Subaru who also likes to play with the outdoor crowd.” https://t.co/yfQju1MK36
I just sent the free, weekly About Chromebooks email newsletter to nearly 5,000 subscribers. Want to join them? Click the link to read this week’s newsletter and subscribe! https://t.co/DeBQyVfXDo
ICYMI: HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook sale: Base model is $979.99 https://t.co/IwQdTAOIJW https://t.co/v3eIEWjHGc

@AlainLe89396509 Who marketed Chromebooks with a USP as “lower price”, retailers? Maybe. But that isn’t, nor was it ever, a USP. In the beginning, you paid less because you had less capability and functionality. Chrome OS has always been about 3 S’s: Speed, Simplicity, Security. *That’s* the USP.
@AlainLe89396509 See the original demo and thoughts on the three S’s at the end of this: https://t.co/Z05f3fdIqT

@AlainLe89396509 Also for reference: The Windows version of the HP Elite Dragonfly is about $1,000 to $1,500 more than this HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook. Mainly because they’re targeted at enterprise. https://t.co/3ukTTXS2J8

@AlainLe89396509 You can still buy a $200 - $300 (or less with sales) Chromebook. But these were never about “being cheap”. That’s a myth based on the first Chromebooks using repurposed netbook hardware. Chrome OS devices also run Android apps and a full Linux install, so not all web based.

@AlainLe89396509 There are Chromebooks at nearly every budget / price point. And the internals of a Chromebook can be the same as a Windows laptop; parts cost the same, regardless of the operating system.
Today I noticed a base model HP Elite Dragonfly Chromebook sale price of $979.99 with delivery expected around the end of July. https://t.co/IwQdTAOIJW

@Angry_Staffer Is there really any true effort to kill the filibuster? There’s risk involved since the minority may gain a congressional majority but at this point, it seems that it’s the only way to get any forward movement.
Gotta protect that transverse V-Twin! Engine guards installed on the #motoguzzi https://t.co/JwCxDP58Jn
ICYMI: Chrome OS 105 adds Ansible to Linux on Chromebooks https://t.co/GE0ScLRUWg https://t.co/8nWrk5uBh0
